short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly add items to your onlygoodgifts.com wishlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to quickly add items to your OnlyGoodGifts.com wishlist from the current web page you are viewing.  Item images and pricing will be auto-detected and pre-filled into the form if possible.
